name: arredemo
description: Instantly build a static site for your package

scripts.site-build: npm run site-clean && node bin/arre.mjs build
scripts.reset: npm run site-clean && npm cache clean --force && rm -fr package-lock.json && rm -fr node_modules && npm i
scripts.test-custom: cd test/arredemo-custom-test && npm run arredemo-clean && npm run arredemo-build
scripts.test-noreact: cd test/arredemo-noreact-test && npm run arredemo-clean && npm run arredemo-build
scripts.test-formiga: cd test/formiga && npm run arredemo-clean && npm run arredemo-build
scripts.test-rdp: cd test/reactstrap-date-picker && npm run arredemo-clean && npm run arredemo-build
scripts.test: npm run test-custom && npm run test-noreact && npm run test-formiga
scripts.prepare: npm run lint && npm run test && npm run site-build

author: donato@afialapis.com
